freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freedesktop.Gypsy.Accuracy

Description

The Accuracy interface is used to get the GPS accuracy.

Namespace

org.freedesktop.Gypsy.Accuracy

Methods

  • GetAccuracy

Signals

  • AccuracyChanged

Errors

None

Methods

GetAccuracy ( ) → iddd

Description: Get the GPS accuracy.

Returns

i: fields

Bit mask, gives fields validity.

d: pdop

Position (3-D) dilution of precision. Unitless. The lower is the value, the better is the accuracy.

d: hdop

Horizontal dilution of precision. Unitless. The lower is the value, the better is the accuracy.

d: vdop

Vertical dilution of precision. Unitless. The lower is the value, the better is the accuracy.

Signals

AccuracyChanged ( )
